The boats are in very safe locations. There are gates for entrance, and a fully staffed office looking after the marina. Each boat can be secured while you are on board, or if you are away for the day. The parking is all in well lit and maintained lots. Do I need to bring my car, and where do I park? We recognize the hassle of traveling with a car within cities. We try to select marinas that are convenient for car-free exploring. Most of our locations are within walking distance to major tourist sites, and also have an abundance of public transportation options.
